createpropulsion.inline_optical_sensor.t: Casts a _ray_ up to _16 blocks long_, detecting blocks.
Emits _redstone signal_. Power is stronger for closer blocks.
Configurable _raycast sensor_. Set _distance_ and _filter_ by block type.
If a matching block is detected, emits _redstone signal_. Power is stronger for closer blocks.
createpropulsion.thruster.tooltip.summar: Provides thrust up to _200 KN_ to push vehicles.
createpropulsion.thruster.tooltip.behavi: Pushes vehicles. Thrust depends on _redstone signal_ strength
